name: Cover Tox Ten 50 Wrinkle Therapy Face Powder, Translucent Light 2736

reviews.name: Cover Tox Ten 50 Wrinkle Therapy Face Powder, Translucent Light 2736
reviews.reviewText: I don't wear foundation...I just wear this product and a little blush. I've been using it now for about 2 years and have gotten more compliments on how young I look and how young my skin looks. The powder goes on smooth, stays and doesn't cake. I really have no need to reapply throughout the day because of it's staying power. AND it lasts forever! So the price is just price for what you get and the length of time it lasts.
reviews.title: Love this product!!!

reviews.name: Cover Tox Ten 50 Wrinkle Therapy Face Powder, Translucent Light 2736
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for a couple of years. I'm 58 years old now. It's the best powder for me at my age. It doesn't sink into my wrinkles -- It stays on top. And it doesn't look cakey. It skims on smoothly and lightly. If I'm in a hurry I just use it by itself and it looks great. If I want a "going out in the evening more makeup look" I wear it over my foundation and it works well that way, too. I love it!
reviews.title: I love this product!

reviews.name: Cover Tox Ten 50 Wrinkle Therapy Face Powder, Translucent Light 2736
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for quite few years. It's one of my favorites. It goes on smoothly, does not settle into lines and is never cakey.
reviews.title: Very good product

reviews.name: Cover Tox Ten 50 Wrinkle Therapy Face Powder, Translucent Light 2736
reviews.reviewText: I am 39 years old and luckily don't have too many wrinkles yet, but I do have the dreaded forehead wrinkle which is more pronounced some days than others for whatever reason. I wasn't happy with how my makeup looked so I recently changed foundation and powder. This powder is the best I have ever used. It doesn't settle into my forehead wrinkle and it's barely noticeable on my skin. It's very lightweight on the skin, so you don't feel smothered by the makeup.
reviews.title: Excellent product!
